title: [Client] Taric Ability Videos not Updated
body:
Its a bit hard to explain but when you click on the taric before you buy him and look at his abilitys, you will see that the videos that show the abilitys in-action are not updated.
http://imgur.com/fDPnOFb

replies.body:
Hey Saphixia - 

Thanks for the report! We'll be sure to get this updated. ^-^

This too please Katey  <3  we need outrageousness on the boards.
{{champion:44}}
all fixed by the looks of it! {{champion:44}}
